channel.title: Candid vibez Archives - The New Vibes
channel.description: Your source for the latest trends in business, Technology, Marketing, Lifestyle, Candid Vibez, Energy, and Health. With our fresh perspective and innovative approach, we bring you the insights and inspiration you need to thrive and be more productive in today's fast-paced world. Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Disentanglement
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
I’m guessing everyone does a relationship check every once in a while to evaluate which relationships to redefine, which ones to halt, and which ones to continue. I don’t know how I got here, 4 months of being single and I was already drowning in situationships and entanglements. I usually would issue a disclaimer that...

The post Disentanglement appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: CharityZ Supports Ms Leticia Teye; Paid Tuition Fee – Edu Scholarship Program
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
As said by Stephen Grellet, I shall pass through this world but once. Any good, therefore, that I can do or any kindness I can show to any human being, let me do it now. Let me not defer it or neglect it, for I shall not pass this way again, has been one of the motivations powering one of the renowned...

item.title: Dreadlocks Saga; Achimota SHS lambasted!
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Everyone is entitled to his or her beliefs. Rastafarian belief shouldn't stop them from having access to education. What will happen if Achimota admits them with their dreadlocks? Why do we always discriminate against our own blacks?

The post Dreadlocks Saga; Achimota SHS lambasted! appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Dreadlocks Saga; People Are Making Achimota School ‘Look Bad’… – Anonymous Comment
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
“Even if I were the headmistress of Achimota, I would do same probably, not because I want to, but I have been entrusted with a dress code I must uphold and until that dress code is amended, I cannot make an exception for one child at the expense of the code and be seen as one who is not firm...
